channel.title: bbcnews TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: Medical experts have strongly pushed back on the US president's claims that taking Tylenol, known as paracetamol elsewhere, "is no good" and that pregnant women should "fight like hell" to only take it in cases of extreme fever. #Tylenol #Paracetamol #Hea

item.title: Typhoon Ragasa has made landfall in China - about two million people were evacuated in preparation. Ragasa has weakened from super to severe typhoon status but remains highly destructive. #TyphoonRagasa #China #Typhoon #BBCNews
